amazing_architect.desc_locked: Complete the Build a Tower challenge to unlock this badge.
amazing_architect.desc_unlocked: You built a tower, a volcano, a lake, and teleported yourself like a wizard – all in Minecraft, all in code. You're an Amazing Architect.
amazing_architect.title: Amazing Architect

block_builder.desc_unlocked: Wow – you made a massive block, all with simple code. You are a serious Block Builder.

folderton_hero.desc_unlocked: You saved a young girl from being kidnapped, and then selflessly gave away your food to help a family in need.  You are the Folderton Hero.
folderton_hero.title: Folderton Hero

saving_eleanor.desc_unlocked: After her family left her alone, you took Eleanor under your wing, and left her with someone who can take care of her. Well done for saving Eleanor.
saving_eleanor.title: Saving Eleanor
